creator: java@essers.com
text:
When adding event listeners to SVG nodes, a mouse event has always button 1
reported, event if the left or right mouse button is clicked!

creator: anna.rydang@afconsult.com
text:
I have also noticed this and It is importent for us that this functionality is 
working, as it is now it is not possible for us to use this new betaversion of 
batik.

creator: cam@apache.org
text: This should be fixed now in SVN.
